New Records: Scotland secured their first T20I victory over Namibia at the fourth attempt.
Gerhard Erasmus passed JJ Smit's record of 51 T20I sixes for Namibia.
Key Match Events: Richie Berrington and Michael Leask's 74-run partnership saw Scotland home.
Gerhard Erasmus scored 52 runs and took 2 wickets for 29 runs.
Brad Wheal took 3 wickets for 33 runs.
Michael Leask scored 35 runs off 17 balls, including four sixes.
Brad Currie took 2 wickets for 16 runs from his four overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Gerhard Erasmus expressed disappointment that his performance did not come in a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Kensington Oval, Bridgetown.
Scotland won by 5 wickets with 9 balls remaining.
Scotland's win put them top of the group.
